resources.string: Automatically switch to a preferred network when both the WLAN network and mobile network are available.
When a WLAN network is detected to have poor connection quality, the mobile network will be used instead. When turned off, the WLAN connection will be prioritised.

Predict network conditions by analysing WLAN signal data. If poor WLAN network quality is expected, this will automatically switch to a mobile network. WLAN connection will be prioritised for home network use.
